survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Autonomous Drone Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on their experience with autonomous drone delivery services, focusing on satisfaction, reliability, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using autonomous drone delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Recommended to use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using autonomous drone delivery services?

questions.question_text: How reliable have you found the drone delivery service in terms of on-time delivery?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure reliability perception.

script.question_text: How reliable have you found the drone delivery service in terms of on-time delivery?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the drone delivery service do you value the most? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify key value drivers for customers.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the drone delivery service do you value the most? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the drone delivery service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback for service improvement.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the drone delivery service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use drone delivery services again in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure future usage intent.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use drone delivery services again in the future?
